Source: R/gene_usage.R
gene_stats.Rd

WIP

gene_stats()

Value

gene_stats returns all segment gene statistics

Examples

gene_stats()
#>     alias                 species ighd ighj ighv igij igkj igkv iglj iglv traj
#> 1      bt               BosTaurus   21    4   25    0    1    6    5   26   46
